name: Art Mahjongg Egypt
description:
Start a mystical and mysterious journey through ancient Egypt! Play your way through a campaign full of adventure and hidden lands. Explore the Sphinx and the pyramids or travel along the Nile. Discover mysterious hidden portals and explore fantastic worlds in this wonderful mahjongg game!

You can enjoy this game in Campaign mode with all its challenges as well as in the relaxed Free Play mode.

- Exciting campaign and relaxed free play mode
- Hidden Worlds
- Two mahjongg-variants: Flight of Horus & Pharaohs Mahjongg
